title: experimental
content: # `prefect.cli.experimental` Experimental CLI commands. These commands provide access to experimental features that are subject to change. ## Functions ### `diagnose` ```python theme={null} diagnose() ``` Diagnose the experimental plugin system. This command provides information about: * Whether the plugin system is enabled * What plugins are discoverable via entry points * Current configuration (timeouts, allow/deny lists) Note: This runs the plugin discovery but does not execute hooks. Use safe mode (PREFECT\_EXPERIMENTS\_PLUGINS\_SAFE\_MODE=1) to test plugin loading without executing hooks.
